subject: Brake pedal malfunction
description_text:
Hi,

I purchased the ProX Ultra package from you about five months ago.
Recently, the brake pedal has developed a fault: if I press the brake pedal
more than halfway down, the braking force continuously decreases even when
I maintain the same pressure with my foot, making it impossible for me to
continue driving.


Best,

Andrew

conversations.body_text: Hi N 486,     Please first check whether the brake pedal’s damping mechanism is installed correctly and whether any slipping might have caused the pressure to be released. You may also send me a photo of the side of the brake pedal or a screenshot of your order, and I can help verify the issue. In addition, you can try updating the firmware to see if that resolves the problem.      ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-proxultra.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.
